vocabulary.definition: completely under the surface of a liquid or submerged in water
vocabulary.example: The shipwreck lay submerged in the depths of the ocean.

vocabulary.definition: having a high mass or weight in relation to volume
tied or secured with a rope or chain
vocabulary.example: The dog was tethered to a post in the yard.

vocabulary.definition: a rigid bar that is used to help lift or move something
vocabulary.example: She used a lever to pry open the stuck door.

vocabulary.definition: the state of being stretched tight
vocabulary.example: The rope was under tension as the weight was applied to it.

vocabulary.definition: playing a part in bringing about a result or helping to cause something to happen
vocabulary.example: Each team member was contributing ideas to the project.
